approve.description: Approves the passed address to spend the specified amount of tokens on behalf of the owner.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another using the allowance mechanism.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens to a specified address.

setOwner.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new owner.

seal.description: Seals the contract, disabling certain functions.

offerBonus.description: Offers a bonus to specified participants.

mint.description: Mints new tokens and assigns them to an owner.

approveAndCall.description: Approves a spender and notifies the contract in a single transaction.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one account to another.

Approval.description: Emitted when an owner approves a spender.
